definition: to hang or suspend/to worry/public announcement/unresolved/baseless/without foundation

sentences.english: Single fiber is thinner than viscose, and fabrics has excellent drapability like silk items.
sentences.chinese: 单纤比粘胶纤维更细，性能近似于丝绸，极具悬垂性。

sentences.english: The walls of the garden overhung with roses.
sentences.chinese: 有玫瑰花悬垂其上的花园围墙。

sentences.english: Fan vaults, springing from slender columns or pendants, became popular.
sentences.chinese: 源起于细长园柱或悬垂装饰的扇形拱顶，变得普及。

sentences.english: Small or bushy trailer or multi- crowned standard.
sentences.chinese: 小型或丛生性的悬垂或多芽的标准型。

sentences.english: Styled in pure wool jersey for luxurious warmth with an elegant drape.
sentences.chinese: 风格与豪华优雅的悬垂性温暖纯羊毛球衣。

sentences.english: A rock overhangs out of the cliff.
sentences.chinese: 有一块岩石悬垂在绝壁之上。

sentences.english: A black trapezium is at the top of the ribbon drape and service ribbon.
sentences.chinese: 黑色梯形是在剪彩悬垂和服务丝带的顶部。

sentences.english: The methods used are the sessile and pendant drop tensiometry.
sentences.chinese: 表面张力之量测乃使用固著液滴和悬垂液滴两种方法。

sentences.english: The area where the electrodes are to be inserted will be sterilized and covered with a surgical drape.
sentences.chinese: 插入体内的电极将要经过消毒和外科悬垂覆盖。

sentences.english: Varying surface tension leads to tangential forces along the interface. This is often called the Marangoni effect.
sentences.chinese: 表面张力之量测乃使用固著液滴和悬垂液滴两种方法。

sentences.english: He is trying to reach the pendulous nests of the weaver-birds.
sentences.chinese: 他正试图拿到那个织巢鸟的悬垂的巢。

definition: to bend/to curve around/curved/crooked/to wind/to warp
to hunch over/to stoop/to arch one's back (upward)
